name: turnstile-api-server
description: Modular Turnstile API Solver with Playwright

scripts.start: node src/index.js --browser-type=chromium --headless=true --thread=8 --port=5000 --useragent='Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/122.0.0.0 Safari/537.36' --host=0.0.0.0
scripts.dev: src/index.js --browser-type=chromium --headless=true --thread=8 --port=5000 --useragent='Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/122.0.0.0 Safari/537.36' --host=0.0.0.0

author: Vrypt
